Coverage: Wide area: Throughout the Roaring Fork Valley, Glenwood Canyon, East and West on I-70, and the Flattops Wilderness north of Glenwood.
Notes: Part of the Colorado Connection System of Repeaters
Nets: Daily 7:30PM Local Time Central Colorado Traffic Net Thursdays 8:00PM Colorado Connection Net All Welcome Sundays 8:00PM Statewide ARES net
